reviews.text: The place is fine , the overground service is not...

Great station which still retains some of its original features on the platform but updated too. There's a very friendly coffee booth and a community garden which is accessible from the platform and in the summer has vegetables you can take! This is quite an unusual feature for a london train station.

I work in Soho and like to take a bus up to Hampstead Heath for a nice walk.
Luckily I live along the Overground route in North West London  so it is great to use the Overground.  Hampstead Heath is a lovely open, clean and well kept station.  There are often staff up in the ticket hall helping people and giving travel advice.
I love the Overground line (except the engineering work on Sundays) and Hampstead Heath is a really nice station to pass through.

Small station with overhead stops (orange line) on our map system...

There are nearby bus stops that can lead to Archway, Holloway areas.
